title: Direct marketing

xdm:hashedEmail.description: Captures the encrypted/hashed version of the visitor's email address.
xdm:hashedEmail.title: Visitor Hashed Email Address

xdm:unsubscriptions.description: The recipient of the direct marketing message such as email or newsletters has opted out from receiving them.

xdm:opens.description: The direct marketing message such as email, SMS, and push notifications has been opened, swiped, or touched by the recipient.

xdm:userComplaints.description: User complaint or complaints have been received. This generally occurs when a recipient of a message reports it as spam.

xdm:bounces.description: Asynchronous messages that have been returned as temporarily undeliverable the receiving system.

xdm:excludes.description: The recipient of the direct marketing message such as email or push has been excluded due to some typology rules configured like fatigue/blacklisted.

xdm:emailDelivered.description: Counts the total number of email messages delivered.

xdm:nonDeliverables.description: Asynchronous messages failed to deliver in a way that indicates that no future delivery attempts will be successful to the address.

xdm:impressions.description: The direct marketing message such as push notifications or in-app message has been seen by the end user.

xdm:customActions.description: Action(s) that users can take on custom objects sent as part of a direct marketing message like push notification.

xdm:mirrorPages.description: Click on a link in a message to a web hosted mirror page.

xdm:sends.description: Asynchronous messages such as email, SMS, and MMS that have been dispatched to a person's account, address, or device.

xdm:marketingSubscription.description: Counter event when a visitor opts-in/subscribes for a direct marketing service.

xdm:unsubscribeReason.description: Tracks the visitor feedback provided when unsubscribing form a direct marketing service.
xdm:unsubscribeReason.title: Marketing Service Unsubscribe

xdm:notSent.description: Asynchronous message such as email, SMS, or MMS was not dispatched due to cancellation or expiration of the marketing activity.

xdm:offerOpens.description: Offer in a marketing message such as email, SMS, or push notifications has been opened, swiped, touched or otherwise interacted with by the recipient.
